name: @jsnell great post! I have loved getting back into mech keyboards. I use a TADA68 at work, with beautiful MiTo Canvas keycaps – https://cleverdevil.io/2018/this-keyboard-is-finally-just-how-i-want-it – and I have a stock NightFox for home/travel – https://kono.store/products/nightfox-mechanical-keyboard
